title: Jess Shears discusses breastfeeding struggles as she rings in anniversary while hubby Dom is away
text:

Love Island 's power couple Jess Shears and Dom Lever welcomed their new arrival last month.

And the married couple, who got together on series three of the ITV2 dating show, have revealed that they had to celebrate their recent wedding anniversary alone due to work commitments.

The name and gender of their tot, has yet to be revealed, but Thursday marked a special occasion as Jess opened up about the struggles of breastfeeding in a candid Instagram story.

Jess followed Stacey Solomon 's trend of 'honest mum posts' as she spoke about out about the difficulties of breastfeeding.

(Image: Instagram)

Stacey, 29 - who shares Rex with partner Joe Swash, revealed that she's no longer breast feeding her little lad and it's taken her a while to be open about it.

The former Love Island babe, 24, pledged her support to Stacey's struggles when she admitted breastfeeding isn't "easy".

She wrote: "Every mum needs to read this!

"Breastfeeding is not easy and although I'm still managing, it's a weight off my shoulders knowing that it is okay if you can't keep it up."

(Image: Instagram)

She finished by saying: "Whatever is best for your baby is right and they will love you no matter what."

Also, Jess revealed that she would be sharing her journey with followers in coming days.

In another sweet Instagram story shared with her 1.3 million followers, Jess revealed that the couple's wedding anniversary was coming up but that they would be forced to celebrate separately due to work commitments.

In a cute clip, Jess looked totally relaxed as she snuggled up to their bundle of joy on the plush sofa while hubby Dom could be seen approaching with a glass of wine.

(Image: Instagram)

Jess posted a caption with the sweet footage: "Wedding anniversary tomorrow but Dom's away for work so baby cuddles and a home cooked dinner tonight.

"- no grand gestures needed, he's already given me everything I could wish for," followed by a heart emoji.

On Monday, Loose Women star Stacey confessed she tried different techniques of breastfeeding baby Rex, who was born in May, but continued to face difficulties which led to her anxiety.

The supermum encouraged her followers to support one another in the journey of motherhood and insisted that it is okay for every mum to do what they think is best for their child.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Jess announced her new arrival on October 5, sharing an adorable picture of the tiny baby lying on its front.

She captioned it: "Baby Lever"

Since then, the couple have continued to share a couple of similar images, where the baby's face isn't fully visible.

(Image: ITV)

Dom and Jess have chosen to keep the details of their baby under wraps and stayed relatively quiet, only occasionally treating fans to cute photos.

The smitten couple, who met on Love Island in 2017, tied the knot last year, hosting their romantic ceremony on the Greek Island of Mykonos.
description: Love Island bombshell Jess Shears has opened up about the reality of breastfeeding in a candid post
